name: Gravity Shuffle: The Quest for Pizza
name_original: Gravity Shuffle: The Quest for Pizza
description:
Spin the world around you to change the gravity and help your motionless character eat all the pizzas in 6 different levels!

Game made in 1 day for the GameDev Society`s Game Jam 2016/2, at UFRGS/Brazil. The theme was "Queda", which means "Fall" (from falling, not the season).
